verses.text: \w After|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w inquired|strong="H7592"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H1961"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*?”

“\w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*,” answered \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. “\w Indeed|strong="H2009"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* land \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.”

\w When|strong="H3068"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w attacked|strong="H5221"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Perizzites|strong="H6522"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* thousand men \w at|strong="H3068"\w* Bezek.

\w And|strong="H5221"\w* \w there|strong="H4672"\w* \w they|strong="H5221"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* Adoni-bezek \w and|strong="H5221"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w*, \w striking|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* \w and|strong="H5221"\w* \w Perizzites|strong="H6522"\w*.

\w As|strong="H7272"\w* Adoni-bezek \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*, \w they|strong="H7272"\w* \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w*, seized \w him|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w cut|strong="H7112"\w* \w off|strong="H7112"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* thumbs \w and|strong="H3027"\w* big \w toes|strong="H7272"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* Adoni-bezek \w said|strong="H3651"\w*, “\w Seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* thumbs \w and|strong="H4428"\w* big \w toes|strong="H7272"\w* \w cut|strong="H7112"\w* \w off|strong="H7112"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w gathered|strong="H3950"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* scraps \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w*. \w As|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w God|strong="H7999"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w repaid|strong="H7999"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w*.” \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w brought|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*. The Capture of Jerusalem and Hebron (Joshua 15:13–19)

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w captured|strong="H3920"\w* \w it|strong="H5221"\w*. \w They|strong="H6310"\w* \w put|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w set|strong="H7971"\w* \w it|strong="H5221"\w* \w on|strong="H7971"\w* fire.

Afterward, \w the|strong="H3427"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* marched \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* \w living|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w country|strong="H2022"\w*, \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* \w Negev|strong="H5045"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* \w foothills|strong="H8219"\w*.\f + \fr 1:9 \ft Hebrew Shephelah or lowlands; that is, the western foothills of Judea\f*

\w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w also|strong="H8034"\w* marched \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w were|strong="H3063"\w* \w living|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w* (\w formerly|strong="H6440"\w* known \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w Kiriath-arba|strong="H7153"\w*), \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w they|strong="H5221"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w Sheshai|strong="H8344"\w*, Ahiman, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Talmai|strong="H8526"\w*.

\w From|strong="H6440"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* marched \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Debir|strong="H1688"\w* (\w formerly|strong="H6440"\w* known \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w Kiriath-sepher|strong="H7158"\w*).

\w And|strong="H1323"\w* \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* said, “\w To|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* man \w who|strong="H1323"\w* \w strikes|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w Kiriath-sepher|strong="H7158"\w* \w and|strong="H1323"\w* \w captures|strong="H3920"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w Acsah|strong="H5915"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* marriage.”

\w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w Othniel|strong="H6274"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w*’s \w younger|strong="H6996"\w* brother \w Kenaz|strong="H7073"\w* \w captured|strong="H3920"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* city, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w Acsah|strong="H5915"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* marriage.

\w One|strong="H1961"\w* day Acsah \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Othniel \w and|strong="H7704"\w* urged \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \f + \fr 1:14 \ft Hebrew; LXX and Vulgate and he urged her; see Joshua 15:18.\f* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* father \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*. \w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* got \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w donkey|strong="H2543"\w*, \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w desire|strong="H7592"\w*?”

“\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w*,” \w she|strong="H3588"\w* answered. “\w Since|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5414"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* land \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Negev|strong="H5045"\w*, \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w springs|strong="H1543"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* well.” \w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* both \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w upper|strong="H5942"\w* \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w lower|strong="H8482"\w* \w springs|strong="H1543"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*’ \w father-in-law|strong="H2859"\w*, \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w Kenite|strong="H7017"\w*, \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w City|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Palms|strong="H8558"\w* \f + \fr 1:16 \ft That is, Jericho\f* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w Wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w Negev|strong="H5045"\w* near \w Arad|strong="H6166"\w*. \w They|strong="H5971"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w* \w among|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w men|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w their|strong="H5221"\w* brothers \w the|strong="H5221"\w* Simeonites, \w attacked|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* \w living|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Zephath|strong="H6857"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w devoted|strong="H2763"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w destruction|strong="H2763"\w*.\f + \fr 1:17 \ft Forms of the Hebrew cherem refer to the giving over of things or persons to the LORD, either by destroying them or by giving them as an offering.\f* \w So|strong="H7121"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Hormah|strong="H2767"\w*.\f + \fr 1:17 \ft Hormah means destruction.\f*

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w also|strong="H5804"\w* \w captured|strong="H3920"\w* \f + \fr 1:18 \ft Hebrew; LXX But Judah did not capture\f* \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w*, Ashkelon, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w*—each \w with|strong="H1366"\w* \w its|strong="H3920"\w* \w territory|strong="H1366"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w took|strong="H3423"\w* \w possession|strong="H3423"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w country|strong="H2022"\w*; \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* could \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w drive|strong="H3423"\w* \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* plains \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*.

\w Just|strong="H1696"\w* \w as|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* \w promised|strong="H1696"\w*, Judah \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w*, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w drove|strong="H3423"\w* \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Anak.

\w The|strong="H3117"\w* Benjamites, \w however|strong="H2983"\w*, \w failed|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w drive|strong="H3423"\w* \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w* \w living|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. \w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w* \w there|strong="H3427"\w* \w among|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* Benjamites.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w attacked|strong="H5927"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*.
\w They|strong="H6440"\w* sent spies \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w* (\w formerly|strong="H6440"\w* known \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w Luz|strong="H3870"\w*),

The Failure to Complete the Conquest

\w At|strong="H3427"\w* \w that|strong="H3669"\w* time \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w failed|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H1323"\w* \w drive|strong="H3423"\w* \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \w the|strong="H3423"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Beth-shean|strong="H1052"\w*, \w Taanach|strong="H8590"\w*, \w Dor|strong="H1756"\w*, \w Ibleam|strong="H2991"\w*, \w Megiddo|strong="H4023"\w*, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w their|strong="H3423"\w* \w villages|strong="H1323"\w*; \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3423"\w* \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* \w were|strong="H1323"\w* \w determined|strong="H2974"\w* \w to|strong="H1323"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w that|strong="H3669"\w* land.
